attributes.action: HOME OFFICE should reduce the IHS fee for UK Immigrants.
attributes.additional_details:
The surcharge will rise from £200 to £400 per year. The discounted rate for students and those on the Youth Mobility Scheme will increase from £150 to £300. The above policy will implement from 8 January 2019. 

1. £150 per year for a student or Tier 5 (Youth Mobility Scheme) visa, eg £300 for a 2-year visa
2. £200 per year for all other visa and immigration applications, eg £1,000 for a 5-year visa

This is totally unreasonable, unaccommodating, unhelpful and unwelcome to the UK Immigrants.
attributes.background:
The surcharge will rise from £200 to £400 per year. The discounted rate for students and on the Youth Mobility Scheme will increase from £150 to £300. The above policy will implement from 8 January 2019. 

This is totally unreasonable, unaccommodating, unhelpful and unwelcome to the UK Immigrants.
